story.text: [[Steven Feuerstein]] is the living god of Oracle PL/SQL programming.
'living god': that's a bit much, isn't it? He's just this guy, you know... (apologies to Douglas Adams)

A bio and list of his books is here at the O'Reilly Books site:
[http://www.oreillynet.com/cs/catalog/view/au/344?x-t=book.view www.oreillynet.com]

Most significantly, he is the author or co-author of several advances in PL/SQL programming including the Unit Testing Framework for PL/SQL ([[Pl Sql Unit]]), a definitive approach to PL/SQL exception handling (an extremely challenging area of that language for most beginners), and one of the first and arguably the language's best commercial code library, PL/Vision.
